description: Brendan Patrick has just made it to his American abode. His new roommate Darin Silvers shows him around the house before the boys fill out the paperwork for marriage. The questionnaire is going smoothly until they have to describe each other’s penises and what it’s like to have sex together. There’s only one way to truthfully answer the question, and it involves Brendan riding Darin’s hard cock.
title: Mail Order Husband Part 2
